no.smidsrod.robin.svg.library
Class Range

java.lang.Object
  no.smidsrod.robin.svg.library.Range

public class Range
extends Object

A range represents a dimension in the chart.

Ranges holds information about a given dimension, such as the maximum and minimum values plotted in the chart. In addition it includes the unit (e.g. km/h, dollars) and the name (salary, speed).

Author:
Robin Smidsr√∏d

Constructor Detail

Range

public Range(int dimension,
             List<Item> itemList)
Parameters:
dimension - The axis this Range represents. The first dimension should use index 0.
itemList - The list of items that is used to calculate minimum/maximum constraints.
Method Detail

getDimension

public int getDimension()
Returns:
Returns the dimension this Range represents. The first dimension is 0 (not 1) if automatically initialized from AbstractChart.

setMin

public void setMin(double min)
Parameters:
min - Set the axis minimum value to the specified value. Side-effect: Disables calculation of minimum value.

setMax

public void setMax(double max)
Parameters:
max - Set the axis maximum value to the specified value. Side-effect: Disables calculation of maximum value.

getMin

public double getMin()
Returns:
Returns the specified minimum value or the calculated minimum value based on the item list.

getMax

public double getMax()
Returns:
Returns the specified maximum value or the calculated maximum value based on the item list.

getUnit

public String getUnit()

setUnit

public void setUnit(String unit)
Parameters:
unit - Specifies the unit string for this specified range. Example: km, USD, dl, gallon, km/h

getName

public String getName()

setName

public void setName(String name)
Parameters:
name - Specifies the name of this range. Example: age, amount, salary

hasGridlines

public boolean hasGridlines()
Returns:
Returns true if either gridlineDistance or gridlineCount is non-zero.

setGridlineDistance

public void setGridlineDistance(double gridlineDistance)
Parameters:
gridlineDistance - Set the distance between the grid lines to the specified distance. Set to 0 to disable grid lines. Side-effect: Will calculate gridlineCount.

setGridlineCount

public void setGridlineCount(int gridlineCount)
Parameters:
gridlineCount - Sets the amount of grid lines to the specified amount. Set to 0 to disable grid lines. Side-effect: Will calculate the grid line distance.

getGridlineDistance

public double getGridlineDistance()

getGridlineCount

public int getGridlineCount()

calcTotalDistance

public double calcTotalDistance()
Returns:
The difference between the maximum and minimum value as an absolute value.

isMinSet

public boolean isMinSet()
Returns:
true if min value has been previously set

isMaxSet

public boolean isMaxSet()
Returns:
true if max value has been previously set
